#GOSourcing

Description for Candidates

Responsible for completing General Office corporate accounting processes for Manufacturing. This includes but is not limited to executing intangible and tangible asset impairment analyses, closed facility exit obligation calculations, investment-based tax credit accounting, financial return calculations, and implementation of new accounting standards, business combination accounting, preparation of certain journal entries and leading certain quality control and process improvement initiatives. Demonstrate the companys core values of respect, honesty, integrity, diversity, inclusion and safety

Responsibilities for Candidates

  • Produce periodic financial statements and various analyses to properly record all financial activities
  • Assist with financial analysis on business initiatives
  • Work across groups on standardization efforts
  • Serve as a back-up resource to the plant Financial Manager

Qualifications for Candidates

• Bachelor's Degree in Accounting/Finance • 2+ years years prior accounting/finance experience • Any experience in an accounting/finance position, a public company or a public accounting firm position
